entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:06 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
